message.body: hey. everything worked out for tomorrow?
He was a no show. I didn't even need to talk to the judge. I was granted a 5 year restraining order that covers me, the dogs and cat as well as my work and house

YAY!!!!! (i wish i could make that bigger!)
i'm soooo glad! congrats! thank you for letting me know. i've been sending good energy your way all morning! ~whew!~
